hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT l.F_PID FROM T_BAT_WORKORDER w,T_MAT_BOM b,T_MAT_BOM_LIST l,t_mat_dic d WHERE w.F_END_BRAND =d.f_value5 and d.f_pid= b.F_MAT_PID and b.F_PID = l.F_BOM_PID AND b.F_SYS_FLAG='1' AND l.F_SYS_FLAG='1' AND w.F_SYS_FLAG='1' and d.f_sys_flag='1' AND w.F_WORKORDER_CODE = ? AND l.f_mat_pid =(select z.f_pid from t_mat_dic z where z.f_code = ? )
